thread.title: BJP General Secretary: Need to strengthen India’s rural economy
thread.title_full: BJP General Secretary: Need to strengthen India’s rural economy

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: BJP General Secretary: Need to strengthen India’s rural economy
text:
Comments 
New Delhi, Oct 12: BJP General Secretary P Murlidhar Rao today stressed upon the need to strengthen the rural economy and agricultural produce so that the country may become self-reliant in the global market. Speaking at a function to mark the 99th birth anniversary of former RSS and BJP leader Nanaji Deshmukh, he said, “Despite having the most fertile land in the world, India is importing a lot of grain-cereals for many years. We are also the biggest importer of edible oil. 
“We need to reduce our dependency on the global market and make our rural economy self-reliant.” Small-scale industries and self-entrepreneurship is important to achieve employment for all, he said, adding, “Hundred per cent employment is a challenge. India should become a manufacturing hub to achieve this besides encouraging small-scale industries.” 
  12, 2015 12:52 AM Topics:
